translation.en: [Evans] I was in the Boston Police for 38 years.
translation.zh: ‎我在波士顿警察局工作了38年

translation.en: I learned a lot of lessons.
translation.zh: ‎我学到了很多东西

translation.en: But the most important thing was
translation.zh: ‎但最重要的是…

translation.en: if people want to hurt people, they'll find ways to do it.
translation.zh:
‎如果人们想伤害别人
‎他们就会想到办法

translation.en: [Evans] We do our best to prevent tragedies like this, but…
translation.zh: ‎我们尽全力阻止这样的悲剧 但是…

translation.en: there's another side to people that no one ever sees.
translation.zh: ‎人会有别人从没看过的一面

translation.en: [Evans] I've done 59 marathons.
translation.zh: ‎我参与过59次马拉松

translation.en: And Boston is the best marathon in the world.
translation.zh: ‎波士顿是世界上最好的马拉松

translation.en: It's like the Rite of Spring. It's right around Easter.
translation.zh:
‎就像春天的仪式一样
‎就在复活节左右

translation.en: The city's coming alive. The flowers are blooming.
translation.zh: ‎这座城市正万物复苏 百花盛开

translation.en: Everybody looks forward to Patriots' Day.
translation.zh: ‎大家都很期待爱国者日

translation.en: It's a local holiday in Boston.
translation.zh: ‎这是波士顿的当地节日

translation.en: Everybody comes out and watches the marathon.
translation.zh: ‎大家都出来看马拉松

translation.en: It's a big day in the city. It's a special day.
translation.zh: ‎今天是城里的大日子 今天很特别

translation.en: [Karen] Massachusetts is one of the only places that celebrates Patriots' Day.
translation.zh:
‎马萨诸塞州是唯一
‎庆祝爱国者日的地方之一

translation.en: It is amazing because there is a lot of history here.
translation.zh: ‎这很棒 因为这里有很多历史

translation.en: It is a great pleasure to come back to a city
translation.zh: ‎很荣幸回到一个

translation.en: where my accent is considered normal.
translation.zh: ‎我的口音被认为是正常的城市

translation.en: People who live in Boston and are from Boston, there is a lot of Boston pride.
translation.zh:
‎住在波士顿的人来自波士顿
‎有很多波士顿的骄傲

translation.en: There's no finer people to me in the world than residents of the city of Boston.
translation.zh:
‎世界上没有比波士顿市的居民
‎对我更好的人了

translation.en: -[woman] We did it! -Fuck you!
translation.zh:
‎-我们成功了！
‎-去你的！

translation.en: They can be really obnoxious when it comes to their sports.
translation.zh: ‎他们在运动方面很粗鲁

translation.en: [all] Let's go, Bruins! Let's go, Bruins!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 棕熊队！

translation.en: [Karen] But the marathon is a big deal in Boston.
translation.zh: ‎但马拉松在波士顿是件大事

translation.en: It's the oldest marathon in America,
translation.zh: ‎这是美国最古老的马拉松

translation.en: and the most premier.
translation.zh: ‎也是最重要的

translation.en: [Karen] It's a very festive day. People make a really big deal about it.
translation.zh:
‎这是个喜庆的日子
‎人们对这件事很在意

translation.en: They do shut the trains down, the buses. The streets are packed with people.
translation.zh:
‎他们停止火车和公交车
‎街上到处都是人

translation.en: I would go to the marathon every year,
translation.zh: ‎我每年都去马拉松现场

translation.en: and the same group of friends, we would all go
translation.zh: ‎和同一群朋友 我们都会去

translation.en: to watch my boyfriend Kevin run.
translation.zh: ‎看我的男朋友凯文跑

translation.en: [Kevin] Honestly, I never thought I'd ever run a marathon.
translation.zh: ‎老实说 我从没想过我会跑马拉松

translation.en: I mean, I didn't run till I was, like, 42.
translation.zh: ‎我直到42岁才开始跑

translation.en: But it's great. It's like a party.
translation.zh: ‎但感觉很好 就像个派对

translation.en: Everyone's pulling and cheering for everyone.
translation.zh: ‎大家都在为所有人欢呼雀跃

translation.en: We're all equal that day.
translation.zh: ‎那天我们都是平等的

translation.en: Starting line is in Hopkinton and it's 26.2 miles away.
translation.zh:
‎起跑线在霍普金顿
‎距离波士顿42.2公里

translation.en: Then you finish in the city. You get there,
translation.zh: ‎然后在波士顿城里结束 你到了那里

translation.en: and everyone's friendly and wishing you luck.
translation.zh: ‎大家都很友善 祝你好运

translation.en: People are just so nice like that.
translation.zh: ‎大家都这么善良

translation.en: The town of Hopkinton is absolutely ready.
translation.zh: ‎霍普金顿镇已经准备好了

translation.en: Their motto is, "It all starts here," and you can feel it in the air.
translation.zh:
‎他们的座右铭是“一切从这里开始”
‎你可以在空气中感受到

translation.en: [Evans] To get into Boston, that's quite an accomplishment.
translation.zh: ‎要进入波士顿 这可是一大成就

translation.en: You don't just sign up. You have to qualify.
translation.zh: ‎你不能随便报名参加 必须有资格

translation.en: And you've hit the pinnacle of your life if you run Boston.
translation.zh:
‎如果你跑了波士顿
‎那你就达到了人生的巅峰

translation.en: [reporter] The center of Boston, the Charles River.
translation.zh: ‎波士顿的中心 查尔斯河

translation.en: It's all part of a huge Patriots' Day celebration.
translation.zh: ‎这都是爱国者日庆祝活动的一部分 ‎（2013年4月15日）

translation.en: [Evans] That particular day, I was able to go off in the very first wave.
translation.zh: ‎那天 我在第一波就出发了

translation.en: -[starting pistol fires] -[spectators cheer]
translation.zh: ‎（2013年波士顿马拉松）

translation.en: [announcer] And the Boston Marathon, already underway for some.
translation.zh: ‎波士顿马拉松对一些人已经开始了

translation.en: The full spectacle of this Boston Marathon is now underway, but sometimes…
translation.zh:
‎这场波士顿马拉松的盛事
‎现在开始了 但有时…

translation.en: [Evans] It was like any other marathon you ever had.
translation.zh:
‎就像你参加过的任何马拉松一样
‎大家都很开心

translation.en: Everyone was happy. It couldn't have been a more perfect day.
translation.zh:
‎就像你参加过的任何马拉松一样
‎大家都很开心 ‎真是最完美的一天

translation.en: Just training with my dad! He's running with me for a little.
translation.zh:
‎只是跟我爸一起训练
‎他跟我跑一会儿

translation.en: -Say hi, Dad. -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-打声招呼 爸爸
‎-嗨

translation.en: [Karen] My friend Krystle and I had a late start
translation.zh:
‎我和我的朋友克里斯特尔
‎出发得晚一些

translation.en: because we had partied a little too much the night before and we got up late.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们在前一晚开派对开得太狠了
‎我们熬夜熬到很晚

translation.en: [announcer] And look at that,
translation.zh: ‎快看

translation.en: the Boston Marathon running right past Fenway Park,
translation.zh: ‎波士顿马拉松赛经过芬威球场

translation.en: which will soon empty out when the Red Sox and Rays are done
translation.zh:
‎当红袜队和雷队完成后
‎球场很快就会被清空

translation.en: and thousands more people will hit the streets.
translation.zh: ‎还有成千上万的人会上街

translation.en: They say a half a million people watch the Boston Marathon
translation.zh: ‎他们说有50万人在新英格兰的街头

translation.en: on the streets here in New England.
translation.zh: ‎看波士顿马拉松

translation.en: Krystle never had gone to the Boston Marathon
translation.zh: ‎克里斯特尔从来没去过波士顿马拉松

translation.en: because she always went to the Red Sox.
translation.zh: ‎因为她总是去红袜队比赛

translation.en: [baseball announcer] To left field. That ball is off the wall.
translation.zh: ‎现在前往左边球场 集中全垒打

translation.en: Pedroia racing around the bases, is headed home.
translation.zh: ‎佩德罗亚在垒赛跑 朝本垒去了

translation.en: The throw will be late, and the Red Sox win! A walk-off on Patriots' Day!
translation.zh:
‎掷球迟了 红袜队获胜！
‎爱国者日的全垒打 立刻结束了比赛

translation.en: [Karen] That day, Krystle and I walked on the side street,
translation.zh: ‎那天 克里斯特尔和我走在小巷上

translation.en: and here we were at the most perfect spot, the finish line.
translation.zh:
‎我们到了
‎拥有最佳视角的地方 终点线

translation.en: [announcer] You look down Boylston Street filled with people.
translation.zh: ‎你看向挤满人的波依斯顿街

translation.en: Flags from all nations.
translation.zh: ‎各个国家的国旗

translation.en: [Karen] I had taken a picture of the flags at the finish line
translation.zh: ‎我在终点线拍了旗子的照片

translation.en: and I had posted it on Facebook.
translation.zh: ‎我在终点线拍了旗子的照片 ‎我发到了脸书上

translation.en: We were texting with all our friends, and they kept saying, "Come and meet us!"
translation.zh:
‎我们跟所有朋友发短信
‎他们一直说：“来见我们！”

translation.en: But we just said we're gonna stay here
translation.zh: ‎但我们只说 我们会待在这

translation.en: because I think we can get a really great picture
translation.zh: ‎因为我觉得我们可以拍下凯文

translation.en: of Kevin crossing the finish line.
translation.zh:
‎因为我觉得我们可以拍下凯文 ‎越过终点线的照片
‎所以我们最后还是待在了那里

translation.en: So we ended up staying there.
translation.zh:
‎越过终点线的照片
‎所以我们最后还是待在了那里

translation.en: And I always remember taking that left onto Boylston Street
translation.zh: ‎我一直记得左转到波依斯顿街

translation.en: and seeing that finish line five blocks away.
translation.zh: ‎看到了五个街区外的终点线

translation.en: And as much as you're hurting, that crowd is rooting you on.
translation.zh: ‎虽然你很疼 但人群在为你欢呼

translation.en: To have my family there, have my police there.
translation.zh: ‎有我的家人在那里 我的警察在那里

translation.en: Uh, you know, it gives you goose bumps.
translation.zh: ‎会让你起鸡皮疙瘩

translation.en: I did it in three hours and 35 minutes, which, as far as I'm concerned,
translation.zh:
‎我在3小时35分钟内完成了
‎当时我只感觉

translation.en: I was thrilled.
translation.zh: ‎我很兴奋

translation.en: At that point, I hopped in my vehicle and drove home to South Boston.
translation.zh:
‎那时我跳上车
‎开车回到南波士顿的家

translation.en: [Jimenez] This particular day, it was starting to pick up a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎这一天开始有点起色

translation.en: More runners were starting to come through.
translation.zh: ‎越来越多的选手跑过来

translation.en: We were starting to cheer people on, like, "Great. Good for you. You did it!"
translation.zh: ‎我们开始为人们加油：“你成功了！”

translation.en: I just love the atmosphere. I love the cheering that goes on.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢那种气氛
‎我喜欢那种欢呼声

translation.en: It's like a big block party.
translation.zh: ‎就像是大的公共派对

translation.en: [Karen] We were standing there waiting for Kevin,
translation.zh: ‎我们站在那里等凯文

translation.en: and friends that were tracking him were texting me to say
translation.zh: ‎追踪他的朋友给我发短信说

translation.en: that Kevin had got a cramp somewhere up in Cambridge,
translation.zh: ‎凯文在剑桥的某个地方抽筋了

translation.en: and he was gonna be a little bit later coming across the finish line.
translation.zh: ‎他会晚一点冲过终点线

translation.en: And we said, "We've got this great spot. We should stay right here."
translation.zh:
‎我们说：“我们站了个好位置
‎我们应该留在这里”

translation.en: [woman] Oh my God.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊

translation.en: [man] It's fucked up over here.
translation.zh: ‎这里好乱

translation.en: [officer 1] 8:30. Something just exploded at the finish line.
translation.zh: ‎8:30 有东西在终点线爆炸了

translation.en: [officer 2] UCC, did I hear that correctly?
translation.zh: ‎我没有听错吧？

translation.en: [officer 3] Yeah, I see it. I confirm it.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我确认

translation.en: Two devices just went off at Boylston and Exeter.
translation.zh:
‎波依斯顿和埃克塞特的
‎新燃烧装置爆炸了

translation.en: -[man 1] Vanessa! Vanessa! -[woman 1] Vanessa! What the hell?
translation.zh:
‎-凡妮莎！
‎-什么鬼？

translation.en: -[man yelling indistinctly] -[woman shrieks] [man 2] What the fuck?
translation.zh:
‎-不要！
‎-什么鬼？

translation.en: [Karen] I remember waking up on the sidewalk.
translation.zh: ‎我记得在人行道上醒来

translation.en: There was a horrendous smell.
translation.zh: ‎有一种可怕的气味

translation.en: My ears were ringing so bad, in that I couldn't really hear.
translation.zh: ‎我的耳朵响得好厉害 我听不太清

translation.en: At that point, it was just chaos.
translation.zh: ‎当时真是一片混乱

translation.en: [Jimenez] I looked around me, and…
translation.zh: ‎我环顾四周…

translation.en: the screams were that of horror.
translation.zh: ‎尖叫声很恐怖

translation.en: [man 1] Okay?
translation.zh: ‎好吗？

translation.en: [man 2] Just move that way.
translation.zh: ‎往那边走就行了

translation.en: There was a woman at one point, and I took a look at her leg and I'm like,
translation.zh:
‎当时有个女人
‎我看了一眼她的腿 心里想

translation.en: "Wow, that looks really bad."
translation.zh: ‎“哇 这看起来太严重了”

translation.en: [Jimenez] And I needed to stop the bleeding somehow,
translation.zh: ‎我需要想办法止血

translation.en: and all I had was my belt.
translation.zh: ‎我只有我的腰带

translation.en: So I took my belt off, and I just remember putting it around her legs
translation.zh:
‎所以我把腰带解下来了
‎我记得缠在了她的腿上

translation.en: to try to stop the bleeding.
translation.zh: ‎试图止血

translation.en: There was chatter on the radio
translation.zh: ‎对讲机有声音

translation.en: that there could potentially be a third bomb.
translation.zh: ‎可能有第三颗炸弹

translation.en: Road is blocked for secondary devices!
translation.zh: ‎道路封锁 可能有二次爆破装置！

translation.en: I called my boyfriend at the time. I told him I loved him.
translation.zh:
‎我打电话给我当时的男朋友
‎告诉他我爱他

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: And I told him to tell my mom I loved her.
translation.zh: ‎我让他告诉我妈妈 我爱她

translation.en: And then…
translation.zh: ‎然后…

translation.en: the line just went dead.
translation.zh: ‎电话就断线了

translation.en: [Karen] I could see blood everywhere.
translation.zh: ‎到处都能看到血

translation.en: And my foot was turned sideways, and it was broken.
translation.zh: ‎我的脚朝一遍倒 断了

translation.en: But I was next to Krystle, and I held her hand.
translation.zh:
‎但我紧挨着克里斯特尔
‎我牵着她的手

translation.en: She looked like a rag doll.
translation.zh: ‎她看起来像个布娃娃

translation.en: That's when the whole reality of what happened really sunk in.
translation.zh: ‎那时我才真正明白发生了什么

translation.en: It was terrible.
translation.zh: ‎太糟糕了

translation.en: [paramedic] Okay, as for the explosions, don't worry about that, okay?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 至于爆炸 别担心了 好吗？

translation.en: That was really loud.
translation.zh: ‎好大声

translation.en: I remember a whole team of people coming to get me
translation.zh: ‎我记得有一整群人过来找我

translation.en: and asking me my name, and I couldn't tell them.
translation.zh: ‎问我的名字 但我没办法告诉他们

translation.en: [Karen] When they put me into the ambulance,
translation.zh: ‎他们把我送进救护车的时候

translation.en: a lady ran up to me and she said, "Miss, here's your phone."
translation.zh:
‎一位女士跑到我面前说
‎“女士 这是你的电话”

translation.en: And I took the phone and I put it in my pocket.
translation.zh: ‎然后我把手机放进口袋里

translation.en: But it was not my phone. It was Krystle's phone.
translation.zh:
‎但那不是我的手机 ‎那是克里斯特尔的手机
‎然后我就什么都不记得了

translation.en: And then I don't remember anything else.
translation.zh:
‎那是克里斯特尔的手机
‎然后我就什么都不记得了

translation.en: We want to bring you some breaking news that is happening right now out of Boston.
translation.zh:
‎（突发新闻） ‎我们想给带您来一条
‎此刻正在波士顿发生的突发新闻

translation.en: We understand there have been at least two explosions near the finish line
translation.zh: ‎我们了解到在波士顿马拉松的终点线

translation.en: of the Boston Marathon.
translation.zh: ‎至少有两次爆炸

translation.en: We are showing you some live pictures from a helicopter right now.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在给您看直升机拍摄的现场图

translation.en: [reporter] It appears that we have quite a tragedy
translation.zh: ‎看来我们发生了一场悲剧

translation.en: on our hands in Boston, Massachusetts this afternoon.
translation.zh: ‎今天下午在马萨诸塞州波士顿

translation.en: We don't know what exploded. We don't know if there was an accident.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道是什么爆炸了
‎我们不知道有没有意外

translation.en: We don't know if somebody set off something.
translation.zh: ‎我们不知道是否有人引爆了什么

translation.en: [Jimenez] When I looked around me, it was chaos.
translation.zh: ‎我环顾四周 一片混乱

translation.en: And somebody mentioned that
translation.zh: ‎有人提到

translation.en: there was somebody there that had…
translation.zh: ‎那里有人已经…

translation.en: uh, passed away.
translation.zh: ‎去世了

translation.en: At this point, we were trying to get the most acute patients to a hospital.
translation.zh:
‎当时我们在尽力
‎把最急的病人送进医院

translation.en: [Kevin] I was stopped near the finish line.
translation.zh: ‎我在终点线附近被拦住了

translation.en: And there were police officers saying the race is canceled.
translation.zh: ‎还有警察说比赛取消了

translation.en: The race is done. It's done. It's over. The marathon's over.
translation.zh: ‎还有警察说比赛取消了 ‎比赛结束了 马拉松结束了

translation.en: They said there was a bomb or something.
translation.zh: ‎他们说有炸弹之类的

translation.en: That's what I, you know… But no one knew nothing.
translation.zh:
‎我就是这么 你知道…
‎但没人知道什么

translation.en: [officer] Run!
translation.zh: ‎快跑！

translation.en: [Kevin] Everyone's scrambling to get out of the city.
translation.zh: ‎每个人都在争先恐后地逃离城市

translation.en: I did keep calling Karen's phone, but all the phones were screwed up.
translation.zh:
‎我一直给凯伦打电话
‎但所有电话都不通

translation.en: So I knew right there that there was a problem. A big problem.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道这是个问题 一个大问题

translation.en: Let's go! Everybody down this way. Folks, time to call it a night. Let's go!
translation.zh:
‎我们走！所有人往这边走
‎各位 今天到此结束 我们走！

translation.en: [man] Where are we supposed to go?
translation.zh: ‎我们要去哪里？

translation.en: [Evans] After the marathon, I was back in South Boston.
translation.zh: ‎马拉松之后 我回到了南波士顿

translation.en: One of my sergeants come running in and he says,
translation.zh: ‎我的一个警佐跑过来说

translation.en: "They're telling me two bombs just went off at the finish line."
translation.zh: ‎“他们告诉我终点线有两颗炸弹爆炸”

translation.en: And I'm saying, "What? That can't… That… That couldn't have happened." "I was just there."
translation.zh:
‎我说：“什么？不能…
‎那不可能 我刚才还在那里”

translation.en: I jumped in my vehicle and put my sirens on.
translation.zh: ‎我跳上车 把警报器挂上

translation.en: And when I went over the 4th Street Bridge,
translation.zh: ‎当我经过第四街桥时

translation.en: I could see people crying.
translation.zh: ‎我能看到人们在哭

translation.en: I could tell this is going to be terrible.
translation.zh: ‎能看出来这会很糟糕

translation.en: [Evans] When I got to the scene,
translation.zh: ‎当我来到现场时

translation.en: I met up with Commissioner Davis, who was just coming back to the scene too.
translation.zh:
‎我见到了戴维斯警监
‎他也刚回到现场

translation.en: [Davis] I stepped out of the car, and as soon as my foot hit the ground,
translation.zh: ‎我下了车 脚刚踩到地面

translation.en: I could feel shrapnel under my feet.
translation.zh: ‎我就能感觉到脚下的弹片

translation.en: And then I saw the damage across the street.
translation.zh: ‎然后我看到了街对面的毁坏

translation.en: The volume of blood and body parts on the ground
translation.zh: ‎地上的血和肢解的人体残骸

translation.en: was just something I had never seen before.

translation.zh: ‎你该从哪里开始？

translation.zh: ‎我当了超过30年的记者

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎你作为一名记者试着找出答案

translation.zh: ‎我赶到现场 他们还在拉黄色条带

translation.zh: ‎有人认为刚刚发生的事

translation.zh: ‎这是一个让所有人都恐惧的情况

translation.zh: ‎我们现在还不知道爆炸的原因

translation.zh:
‎大家都在争先恐后地了解

translation.zh: ‎我们在餐厅 有两次巨大的爆炸

translation.zh: ‎一个轻一些 一个真的很大 很糟糕

translation.zh: ‎听起来像是炮击

translation.zh:
‎但感觉很强烈
‎都要把我的帽子吹飞了

translation.en: Not sure exactly what they're saying, whether it's an accident or not.
translation.zh:
‎不知道他们到底在说什么
‎到底有没有意外

translation.zh: ‎没人知道发生了什么

translation.zh: ‎警察在面对很多疑点

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

‎我们到处都找不到他

translation.zh: ‎警察来找我说

translation.zh:
‎“离开这里
‎我们不知道还会发生什么”

translation.en: We start to get a crush of reports of bombs all over the city.
translation.zh:
‎我们开始接到
‎整个城市各种爆炸的报警

translation.en: And then there was a suspicious fire that occurred at the JFK Library.
translation.zh:
‎然后肯尼迪图书馆
‎发生了一场可疑的火灾

translation.en: [reporter] This happened so soon after these two explosions.
translation.zh: ‎这是在这两场爆炸后不久发生的

translation.en: Could this possibly be connected?
translation.zh: ‎这会有所关联吗？

translation.en: [Evans] We already had two go off.
translation.zh: ‎我们已经有两个炸弹了

translation.en: Everyone thought these things come in three.
translation.zh: ‎大家都认为会有第三个

translation.en: Our worst fear is the second attack.
translation.zh: ‎我们最害怕的是会有第二次攻击

translation.en: We're in new territory here, and I knew I needed all the help I could get.
translation.zh:
‎我们来到了新的领地
‎我知道我需要一切帮助

translation.en: So, I immediately reached out to Rick DesLauriers.
translation.zh: ‎所以我立刻联系了瑞克·德斯勒尔

translation.en: [DesLauriers] I've been described by some of my associates
translation.zh:
‎（瑞克·德斯勒尔
‎联邦调查局特工负责人） ‎我被一些同事形容为

translation.en: as someone who assesses things.
translation.zh: ‎评估事物的人

translation.zh: ‎我会详尽评估

translation.en: And I try to understand
translation.zh: ‎我试着理解

translation.en: what's gonna take to get the best resolution possible.
translation.zh: ‎怎样才能得到最好的解决方案

translation.en: When I arrived in Boston,
translation.zh: ‎我到波士顿时

translation.en: the first priority was to make sure there are no secondary bombs down there.
translation.zh: ‎首要任务是确保下面没有二次爆炸

translation.en: But we couldn't do that until we'd secured the crime scene.
translation.zh: ‎但我们要先戒严罪现场

translation.en: We had a third of a mile on Boylston Street we had to seal off,
translation.zh: ‎我们在波依斯顿街还有400米要封锁

translation.en: and then one block either side north and south of Boylston Street.
translation.zh:
‎还有一个街区
‎北面或者南面朝着波依斯顿街

translation.en: And it was just a devastating scene. You saw carnage everywhere.
translation.zh:
‎那是一个让人绝望的画面
‎到处都能看到大屠杀

translation.en: There was still blood of the victims on the sidewalk.
translation.zh: ‎人行道上还有受害者的血迹

translation.en: [Davis] Looking across the crime scene, I realized that there were bags all over the place.
translation.zh:
‎往犯罪现场那边看
‎我发现到处都是包

translation.en: Any one of those things could have been a bomb.
translation.zh: ‎任何一个都可能是炸弹

translation.en: [DesLauriers] Our task at that point was to send our bomb techs down there
translation.zh:
‎我们当时的任务是

translation.en: and then search for secondary devices.
translation.zh: ‎然后搜查二次爆炸装置

translation.en: We had bomb-sniffing dogs.
translation.zh: ‎我们有嗅探炸弹的狗

translation.en: We're going through backpacks, going through storefronts.
translation.zh:
‎我们一个一个包检查
‎一家一家店铺前面搜索

translation.en: We were still sweeping the scene.
translation.zh: ‎我们还在横扫现场

translation.en: [Davis] The bomb squad starts to secure the crime scene
translation.zh: ‎炸弹小队开始搜查案发现场是否安全

translation.en: so that the rest of the analysts could safely come on the course.
translation.zh: ‎这样剩下的分析师才能安全地过来

translation.en: [DesLauriers] Once we determined there are no secondary incendiary devices
translation.zh: ‎一旦我们确定 ‎炸弹现场没有二次爆炸装置

translation.en: at the bomb site,
translation.zh: ‎炸弹现场没有二次爆炸装置

translation.en: we called US Attorney Carmen Ortiz.
translation.zh: ‎我们叫了美国律师卡门·奥蒂兹

translation.en: She would ultimately be the person responsible for prosecuting the bombers.
translation.zh: ‎她最终会成为负责起诉放炸弹的人

translation.en: [Ortiz] When I looked at the destruction,
translation.zh: ‎当我看到破坏时

translation.en: I just stood there with a cold chill.
translation.zh: ‎我就站在那打寒颤

translation.en: It certainly seemed to be a terrorist act.
translation.zh: ‎这似乎肯定是恐怖行为

translation.en: We could see the shrap metal, the BBs, the blood.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以看到金属碎片、弹片、鲜血

translation.en: You know, we knew this was some type of device gone off.
translation.zh: ‎我们知道这是某种装置爆炸了

translation.en: [Davis] We sent state troopers to Logan Airport
translation.zh: ‎我们派州警去洛根机场找任何

translation.en: to catch any of the public that may have had photos in their cameras.
translation.zh: ‎我们派州警去洛根机场找任何 ‎相机里可能有照片的公众

translation.en: That was when we set up Black Falcon Terminal
translation.zh: ‎那时候我们建立了黑色猎鹰终端

translation.en: as a location to process evidence.
translation.zh: ‎作为处理证据的地点

translation.en: [DesLauriers] This location was tremendously important as being a secure, convenient location
translation.zh: ‎这个地点非常重要 要安全、方便

translation.en: where we could collect that evidence, process it,
translation.zh: ‎我们可以收集证据去处理

translation.en: and have it flown down to Quantico, Virginia.
translation.zh: ‎然后把它给弗吉尼亚州的匡提科

translation.en: [Davis] There were so many pieces of evidence
translation.zh: ‎有很多证据

translation.en: We were just at a different scale than I'd ever seen before.
translation.zh: ‎这规模远远超出我之前见过的一切

translation.en: This was the biggest case that's ever happened in this city
translation.zh: ‎这是本市有史以来最大的案子

translation.en: and we had no idea who was responsible.
translation.zh: ‎我们不知道是谁干的

translation.en: So we started to send investigators out to question the injured.
translation.zh: ‎所以我们开始派调查员去问讯伤者

translation.en: I have shrapnel in the back of my leg, my hands, obviously,
translation.zh: ‎我的后腿和手上显然有弹片

translation.en: and I got flash burns, but I'm blessed.
translation.zh: ‎我有闪光灼伤 但我很幸运

translation.en: Some of the patients have already received traumatic amputations at the scene.
translation.zh:
‎有些病人在现场就已经
‎接受了创伤性截肢

translation.en: Their legs have been blown off.
translation.zh: ‎他们的腿炸没了

translation.en: [Davis] Then we got a report of a suspicious person
translation.zh:
‎然后我们收到了
‎关于一个可疑人的报告

translation.en: that is being accompanied back to the emergency room.
translation.zh: ‎被医护送回了急诊室

translation.en: This guy, who was a Saudi national, comes out of the smoke.
translation.zh: ‎这个人是沙特人 从烟雾里走出来

translation.en: He's all cut up and in tattered clothes.
translation.zh: ‎全身都被割破了 穿着破烂的衣服

translation.en: And when the police start to walk towards him,
translation.zh: ‎当警察朝他走的时候

translation.en: he sees the police coming, he's got a cell phone in his hand,
translation.zh: ‎他看到警察来了 他手里有一个手机

translation.en: and he throws the cell phone on the ground and smashes it.
translation.zh: ‎然后他把手机扔在地上摔碎了

translation.en: Cell phones can be detonators.
translation.zh: ‎手机可能是引爆器

translation.en: There is an individual who is in custody.
translation.zh: ‎有个人被拘留了

translation.en: He is a Saudi national who was near the scene of the blast.
translation.zh: ‎他是一个在爆炸现场附近的沙特人

translation.en: I'm thinking, "Is this one of our guys?"
translation.zh: ‎我在想“这是我们要找的人之一吗？”

translation.en: [Martin] Among the first things you heard was that a Saudi national
translation.zh: ‎你听到的第一件事 ‎是一个沙特人被视为嫌疑犯

translation.en: was considered a suspect.
translation.zh: ‎是一个沙特人被视为嫌疑犯

translation.en: There was an assumption that this might be related to Al-Qaeda.
translation.zh: ‎有人推测这可能与基地组织有关

translation.en: For over a decade,
translation.zh: ‎十多年来

translation.en: this country has been on edge, vigilant for the next attack.
translation.zh:
‎这个国家一直处于边缘
‎警惕下一次的攻击

translation.en: Well, today it came.
translation.zh: ‎今天 这一天来了

translation.zh: ‎他受伤了 警方正在医院

translation.en: this Saudi national at the hospital.
translation.zh: ‎问讯这个沙特人

translation.zh: ‎我们和他交谈

translation.en: and we had the SWAT Team guys and detectives go to his house.
translation.zh:
‎然后我们让特警队的人
‎和警探去了他家

translation.en: Found suspicious things at the house,
translation.zh: ‎我们在屋子里发现了可疑的东西

translation.en: some official documents, passports, things like that that were problematic.
translation.zh:
‎一些官方的文件、护照
‎可能有问题的物品

translation.en: [Ortiz] Given the severity of the situation, you want to do it in a way that is legal,
translation.zh:
‎鉴于情况的严重性
‎你想用合法的方式做

translation.en: so that if that evidence leads
translation.zh: ‎以便如果证据导向了

translation.en: to the individual that you believe committed this crime,
translation.zh: ‎你认为犯下了这个罪的人

translation.en: you are going to be able to use that evidence in court.
translation.zh: ‎你将能够在法庭上使用那些证据

translation.zh: ‎当局搜查了一个在爆炸中受伤

translation.zh: ‎并被看到逃跑的外国学生的公寓

translation.en: but they found nothing, and he is not considered a suspect.
translation.zh:
‎但他们什么都没发现
‎他没有被当作嫌疑人

translation.en: Turns out he was simply a victim. He had nothing to do with it.
translation.zh:
‎证明他只是一个受害者
‎他与此无关

translation.en: He happened to be a Saudi near the finish line
translation.zh: ‎他碰巧在终点线附近

translation.en: who was living in an age of Islamophobia.
translation.zh: ‎生活在伊斯兰恐怖年代的沙特人

translation.en: And there was no doubt that there's a degree of prejudice
translation.zh: ‎毫无疑问 谁可能是罪犯的问题上

translation.en: about who might be responsible.
translation.zh: ‎存在一定程度的偏见

translation.zh:
‎第一天过后
‎我们就没有任何嫌疑人了

translation.en: We had a few leads, but nothing tangible. And we were going to be holding a press conference
translation.zh:
‎我们有几条线索 但没能推论出什么
‎我们要举行一场新闻发布会

translation.en: to tell the American public what we knew about the bombings.
translation.zh:
‎来告诉美国公众
‎这次爆炸事件我们所知道的信息

translation.en: I told the governor this has the potential to be a terrorist attack,
translation.zh: ‎我告诉州长 这可能是一起恐怖袭击

translation.en: so the FBI will be happy to take the lead in this investigation.
translation.zh: ‎所以联邦调查局很乐意带头调查

translation.zh: ‎坦白说 我就说“好 你们负责吧”

translation.zh: ‎但州长让我主持新闻发布会

translation.zh: ‎然后我说“我？”

translation.zh: ‎我应该意识到的 对吧？

translation.zh:
‎政客不喜欢告诉人们坏消息
‎然后我就是通知坏消息的人

translation.en: So let me turn it over now to Ed Davis, Commissioner of Police here in Boston.
translation.zh:
‎现在让我交给波士顿这边的警监
‎艾德·戴维斯

translation.en: Thank you, Governor. Um…
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 州长

translation.zh: ‎在下午2:50 发生了多次同时的爆炸

translation.en: that occurred along the route of the Boston Marathon near the finish.
translation.zh: ‎沿着波士顿马拉松赛路线终点附近

translation.en: People should be calm, but they should understand
translation.zh: ‎人们应该冷静 但他们应该明白

translation.zh:
‎这是一个正在持续的事件
‎他们应该明白

translation.zh: ‎我们需要所有我们能获得的有用信息

translation.zh:
‎我告诉公众
‎“如果你们有任何照片 就给我们”

translation.en: If anyone saw anything at this incident,
translation.zh: ‎如果有人在这次事故中看到了什么

translation.zh:
‎他们应该打给我们

translation.zh:
‎很多时候在这种情况下
‎有人看到发生了什么 意识到

translation.zh: ‎“我的天 他告诉我

translation.zh: ‎他要做这样的事 我必须要报警“

translation.zh:
‎你现在是把这件事

translation.zh:
‎帕特里克州长说这是一起袭击

translation.zh: ‎我们现在还无法完全确定

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎作为公民和记者 这似乎是恐怖行为

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎但我们必须收集证据才能下定论

translation.en: [Kevin] That night, I'm out looking for Karen.
translation.zh: ‎那天晚上 我出去找凯伦

translation.zh: ‎我不知道发生了什么

translation.zh: ‎然后我女儿说

translation.zh:
‎“我们可以把你发到脸书上

translation.zh:
‎我接到了克里斯特尔男朋友

translation.zh: ‎乔来了 来接我

translation.zh:
‎他给我看了一张

translation.zh: ‎不知怎么照片已经在网上了

translation.zh: ‎我们立刻就去了麻省总医院

translation.zh:
‎我们到了那里 然后他们告诉我

translation.zh:
‎他们正在给她的腿做手术

translation.zh: ‎他们会努力挽救

translation.zh: ‎但他们告诉我凯伦不在那里

translation.zh:
‎他们无法给出任何答案

translation.zh: ‎他们说

translation.zh: ‎“我们不知道要告诉你什么“

translation.zh: ‎然后他们就继续忙了

translation.en: It didn't make sense.
translation.zh: ‎这说不通

translation.en: And they said,
translation.zh: ‎他们说

translation.zh: ‎“你们要去所有的医院问”

translation.en: So we start walking.
translation.zh: ‎于是我们开始走路

translation.zh:
‎眼前空无一人
‎我从没见过这种场景

translation.zh: ‎在波士顿空无一人

translation.zh:
‎我们到处找遍了

translation.zh:
‎没有人给我们任何答案

translation.zh:
‎我的想法 我想凯伦已经死了

translation.zh: ‎波士顿分部网络团队的主管

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我们立即知道 数字媒体会成为

translation.zh: ‎我没有考虑到的是 涌入的数字证据

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎除此之外 我们面临的挑战是

translation.zh: ‎让这个不管是谁的罪犯逃走

translation.zh: ‎我处理过暴力犯罪、毒品、帮派

translation.zh: ‎当我看到爆炸的画面

translation.zh: ‎我的妻子说“去抓到这些杂种”

translation.zh: ‎这是你能走到最接近

translation.zh: ‎昨天波士顿马拉松爆炸案的地方

translation.zh: ‎安保非常严密 这并不意外

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我们仍然不知道为什么

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎他们没有找到任何没有爆炸的设备

translation.zh: ‎在星期二早上 证据响应团队

translation.zh: ‎介入 开始仔细检查犯罪现场

translation.zh: ‎我们在楼顶、窗台、车顶有证据

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这些是我们认为装炸弹的背包

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎随着我们收集证据

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎第一个炸弹在终点线附近爆炸

translation.zh: ‎在一个叫做论坛的饭店前面

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这些是压力炸弹 里面有金属碎片

translation.zh: ‎压力炸弹是流行的恐怖主义武器

translation.zh: ‎因为零件可以在不同的商店买到

translation.zh: ‎周一爆炸案中使用的压力炸弹

translation.zh: ‎有某种国内恐怖主义的特征？

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎但当时不管谁是罪犯

translation.zh: ‎我们找到了背包 压力炸弹

translation.zh: ‎我们发现了压力炸弹里面的金属碎片

translation.zh:
‎这些显然是设计用来致残

translation.zh: ‎所以我们很愿意告诉美国公众

translation.zh: ‎我们怀疑这是恐怖袭击

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎鉴于我们现在了解到的情况

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎都是恐怖主义行为

translation.zh:
‎在我们掌握所有事实之前

translation.zh: ‎但不要误会 我们一定会彻查此案

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎但尤其是对穆斯林来说

translation.zh: ‎但确实发生了变化

translation.zh: ‎当然突然之间 感觉我们是凶手了

translation.zh: ‎那段时间对我们来说很艰难

translation.zh: ‎伊斯兰教的精髓是做一个好人

translation.zh:
‎我们在这里是美国人
‎我们是社会的一部分

translation.zh: ‎但当你不知道某件事的时候

translation.zh: ‎你的第一反应就是害怕

translation.zh: ‎对穆斯林就是这样

translation.zh: ‎是持续的 每天都这样

translation.zh: ‎我每次都在隐瞒自己的某些方面

translation.zh: ‎每当我在… ‎寻求生活方向的时候 真的

translation.zh: ‎我七岁的时候搬到波士顿

translation.zh: ‎911两周之前

translation.zh: ‎然后逃跑 然后发出滴答声

translation.zh: ‎所以我做穆斯林觉得很丢脸

translation.zh: ‎你忍不住在内心有不安

translation.zh: ‎伊斯兰恐惧症才开始要消失了

translation.zh:
‎我马上就知道他们会把责任

translation.zh: ‎一旦我们确定这是一个恐怖袭击事件

translation.zh: ‎联邦政府就会开足马力

translation.zh: ‎去找这些投放炸弹的人

translation.zh: ‎我们知道爆炸发生的地点

translation.zh: ‎在波依斯顿街上有很多商户

translation.zh: ‎它们前面都有监控录像

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我们很快就开始处理了

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我们让分析人员反复看这个视频

translation.zh: ‎倒带、再次播放、倒带

translation.zh: ‎放大

translation.zh: ‎一整晚 一帧一帧地看

translation.zh: ‎这段视频一点都没有引人注目的东西

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎“这些照片刚好是在爆炸发生前拍的”

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这个照片拍到了地上的一个包

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎视频显示了一个比其他人高的人

translation.zh: ‎戴着白帽

translation.zh: ‎我立刻打电话给瑞克说

translation.zh:
‎凯文·斯文顿给我打电话
‎他说：“老大 想给你看一段视频”

translation.en: You see this individual with a white hat walking forward toward the bomb site,
translation.zh:
‎你看到一个戴着白色帽子的人
‎朝着炸弹位置那里走过去

translation.en: and he stops right by a tree in front of The Forum restaurant.
translation.zh: ‎他在论坛饭店前的一棵树那里停下了

translation.en: And he stands there looking around like anybody else.
translation.zh: ‎像其他人一样站在那里到处看

translation.en: Then you see him drop the backpack to the ground and he stands there.
translation.zh:
‎然后你能看到
‎他把背包扔到了地上 站在了那里

translation.en: [Swindon] Looks like he's taking pictures of people running. He's texting.
translation.zh:
‎他看起来好像在拍
‎跑步的人的照片 在发短信

translation.en: And then you see the concussive effects of the first bomb going off.
translation.zh:
‎然后就看到了
‎第一个炸弹爆炸的震荡效应

translation.en: Everybody on the camera looks to the left, and then he just quickly walks to the right.
translation.zh:
‎镜头上的每个人都在向左看
‎然后他很快向右走了

translation.en: [woman] Oh my God! Something blew up. Something blew up. Oh my God, something happened.
translation.zh:
‎我的天啊！有东西爆炸了
‎天啊 出事了

translation.en: And as soon as he leaves the field of view of the camera,
translation.zh: ‎他刚一离开摄像头的视野

translation.en: the second bomb goes off right in front of The Forum restaurant.
translation.zh: ‎第二颗炸弹就在论坛饭店前面爆炸了

translation.en: At that point, we knew we had the video of one of the bombers.
translation.zh:
‎这时我们知道
‎拿到了投放炸弹的人的视频

translation.en: We called him White Hat.
translation.zh: ‎我们叫他白帽

translation.en: [Martin] Wednesday is almost like this blackout day because you're not hearing anything,
translation.zh:
‎周三简直像断片日
‎因为没有听到任何东西

translation.en: and then suddenly a press conference that was supposed to begin is canceled.
translation.zh:
‎然后一个本来要开始的记者招待会
‎突然被取消了

translation.en: We are having a press conference.
translation.zh: ‎我们要开记者会

translation.en: But now we need more time to prepare. Thank you very much.
translation.zh:
‎但现在我们需要更多时间准备
‎非常感谢

translation.en: -[reporter] What time is it? -I don't know what time.
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么时候？
‎-我不知道什么时候

translation.en: We made a decision to not have a press conference
translation.zh: ‎我们决定不开记者会

translation.en: because we had discovered the video evidence at that time,
translation.zh: ‎因为我们发现了当时的视频证据

translation.en: and we had to focus on that first.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须先集中精力在那上面

translation.en: But I think that that led to some media speculation
translation.zh: ‎但我认为这引起了一些媒体猜测

translation.en: as to what might be going on.
translation.zh: ‎猜测可能发生了什么

translation.en: The police were trying to keep a tight lid on information.
translation.zh: ‎警方一直在严密监视情报

translation.en: You saw the void being filled on social media.
translation.zh: ‎你看到社交媒体填补了空白

translation.en: Folks were looking at photos saying, "What do you know about this person?"
translation.zh:
‎人们在看照片说
‎“你知道这个人的什么？”

translation.en: The problem with asking that question, though, of course, it is accusatory.
translation.zh: ‎问这个问题 当然是指责性的

translation.en: Folks were being pointed at,
translation.zh: ‎很多人被指点

translation.en: and the Boston police were getting a lot of false leads.
translation.zh: ‎波士顿警方得到了很多错误线索

translation.en: Somebody posted a picture of a shadowy figure
translation.zh: ‎有人贴出一个有模糊人影

translation.en: walking on the rooftop.
translation.zh: ‎在屋顶上走的照片

translation.en: It looked like one of these Sasquatch pictures.
translation.zh: ‎看起来像是大脚野人的照片

translation.en: And then we receive a picture of a little bag on the racecourse
translation.zh: ‎然后我们收到了爆炸发生的跑道上

translation.en: where the explosion happened.
translation.zh: ‎有一个小包的照片

translation.en: And then the bureau did an analysis on it and they said, "No, this was Photoshop."
translation.zh:
‎然后局里分析了一下说：
‎“不 这是合成的假照片”

translation.en: That takes investigative resources away from chasing the bad guys.
translation.zh:
‎这样就让调查资源从抓住坏人身上
‎转移了

translation.en: But that stuff was appearing online.
translation.zh: ‎但那些东西出现在了网上

translation.en: [Martin] People were sitting in their living rooms, playing detective on social media.
translation.zh:
‎人们坐在客厅里
‎在社交媒体上扮演侦探

translation.en: It also became an opportunity for bigots
translation.zh: ‎这也成为了偏执狂的机会

translation.en: to bask in their assumptions and to propagate those further.
translation.zh: ‎来做假设 并且进一步传播

translation.en: People would say this is clearly the work of Islamic terrorists.
translation.zh:
‎人们会说这显然是
‎伊斯兰恐怖分子的行为

translation.en: And it didn't help that right-wing figures were echoing this.
translation.zh:
‎右翼人物对此呼应
‎也没有起到好作用

translation.en: Most terrorists, lately at least, have been Muslim.
translation.zh:
‎大多数恐怖分子
‎至少最近都是穆斯林

translation.en: They were resparking the flames of Islamophobia throughout the nation.
translation.zh:
‎他们在全国各地激发起了
‎伊斯兰恐惧症

translation.en: The news media outlets were not helping.
translation.zh: ‎新闻媒体没有起到好作用

translation.en: Our sources on this story have encouraged us to look deeply
translation.zh: ‎我们对本案的消息来源鼓励我们

translation.en: into who this Saudi national is.
translation.zh: ‎深入查看这位沙特国民是谁

translation.en: [Martin] Even after he was cleared, the media was hounding
translation.zh: ‎就算他被洗脱罪名 媒体依然在纠缠

translation.en: the Saudi Arabian national and even his roommate.
translation.zh: ‎这个沙特阿拉伯人 甚至是他的室友

translation.en: [reporter] Do you know anything about these bombings?
translation.zh: ‎你知道这些爆炸案的情报吗？

translation.en: Do you have anything to do with them? The police came to your apartment.
translation.zh:
‎你和他们有关系吗？
‎警察去了你们的公寓

translation.en: And then they said someone had been brought down to the federal courthouse.
translation.zh: ‎然后他们说有人被带到了 ‎联邦法院

translation.en: There are various media reports that an arrest has been made.
translation.zh: ‎有很多媒体报道 有人被逮捕了

translation.en: And now there are hundreds of people outside the federal courthouse.
translation.zh: ‎现在法院外有几百人

translation.en: Reporters are everywhere. It's like chaos.
translation.zh: ‎到处都是记者 很混乱

translation.en: I remember saying, "Ed, is this guy in custody?"
translation.zh: ‎我记得我说：“这个人被拘留了吗？”

translation.en: He said, "No, no, I didn't hear."
translation.zh: ‎他们说：“没有 我没听说”

translation.en: There was a lot of misinformation. A lot of clamoring to be breaking news.
translation.zh: ‎有很多误传 很多人都在爆料

translation.en: [Ortiz] The next thing I know,
translation.zh: ‎我知道接下来

translation.en: there's potentially a bomb or some explosive in the area.
translation.zh: ‎该地区可能有潜在炸弹或炸药

translation.en: [reporter] After all that commotion, we were given the all clear,
translation.zh:
‎经历了这么多骚动之后
‎我们被解除了警报

translation.en: and employees were allowed to go inside, get their belongings,
translation.zh: ‎员工可以进去拿东西

translation.en: and then court was closed down for the day.
translation.zh: ‎法庭今天关闭了

translation.en: Authorities stress there is no suspect in custody.
translation.zh: ‎当局强调没有嫌犯被拘留

translation.en: [Evans] There was a lot of misinformation out there being generated.
translation.zh: ‎外面制造了很多错误信息

translation.en: We had to stay focused on what was real and what wasn't real.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须专注于什么是真实的
‎什么是不真实的

translation.en: [DesLauriers] At that point, we knew we had visually identified one of the bombers.
translation.zh:
‎当时我们知道
‎视觉上识别了一个炸弹袭击者

translation.en: The next priority was gathering more video evidence
translation.zh: ‎接下来的重点是从波依斯顿街上

translation.en: from along Boylston Street.
translation.zh: ‎收集更多视频证据

translation.en: Because we wanted to determine if there were any other leads
translation.zh: ‎我们想确定是否有其他的线索

translation.en: that could help us identify this individual.
translation.zh: ‎能帮我们认出这个人

translation.en: The next critical piece of evidence we gained access to
translation.zh: ‎下一个我们能拿到的关键证据

translation.en: was a video from a business
translation.zh: ‎就是一个商户的视频

translation.en: that was on the corner of Boylston Street, named Whiskey's.
translation.zh:
‎那是波依斯顿街拐角处
‎叫威士忌的商户

translation.en: From the video, we were able to time sync it
translation.zh: ‎从视频中 我们可以进行时间同步

translation.en: to identify White Hat walking around the corner.
translation.zh: ‎认出白帽走过街角

translation.en: But we realized there was more to the video.
translation.zh: ‎但我们发现视频里还有更多东西

translation.en: He was accompanied by another gentleman with a black hat and a backpack,
translation.zh:
‎他身边还有另一个戴着黑帽
‎背着背包的人陪同

translation.en: and they were together.
translation.zh: ‎他们是一起的

translation.en: [Foley] That became its own investigation. We've got them here.
translation.zh:
‎这变成了一个独立调查
‎我们在这里找到他们了

translation.en: How can we follow them backwards in time through video footage?
translation.zh:
‎我们怎么才能通过录像
‎在时间上跟着他们往后退？

translation.en: [Swindon] We were able to build a timeline in between those two locations
translation.zh:
‎我们用不同的数字录像机
‎在这两个地点之间

translation.en: from the different digital video recorders.
translation.zh: ‎建立了时间线

translation.en: And then sort of trace their steps,
translation.zh: ‎然后追踪他们的脚步

translation.en: turning the corner at Whiskey's and walking towards The Forum.
translation.zh: ‎在威士忌那里转角 走向论坛饭店

translation.en: It became evident to us that these two were hiding in plain sight.
translation.zh:
‎我们很明显地看到这两个人
‎躲在了光天化日之下

translation.en: [DesLauriers] These individuals did not have hoods.
translation.zh: ‎这些人没有头套 他们没有遮住脸

translation.en: They weren't obscuring their faces. They could be visually recognized.
translation.zh: ‎这些人没有头套 他们没有遮住脸 ‎他们可以被认出来

translation.en: These were two young, Caucasian males.
translation.zh: ‎他们是两个年轻的白人男性

translation.en: They had hats on, sunglasses.
translation.zh: ‎他们戴了帽子、墨镜

translation.en: Problem is, is that we didn't know who they were.
translation.zh: ‎问题是我们不知道他们是谁

translation.en: At the time, facial recognition software was good
translation.zh: ‎当时 人脸识别软件很好

translation.en: if you had a three-inch-by-three-inch clear face shot.
translation.zh:
‎前提是你有一个7.62厘米见方的
‎清晰的面部照片

translation.en: We just didn't have that type of clarity. They were grainy.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有那种清晰度 很模糊

translation.en: They were sometimes taken at a distance.
translation.zh: ‎有时是从远处拍摄的

translation.en: We didn't know who they were,
translation.zh: ‎我们不知道他们是谁

translation.en: we didn't know what their motivations for doing the bombings were,
translation.zh: ‎以及他们进行爆炸的动机

translation.en: but we had the bombers in sight.
translation.zh: ‎但我们看到了爆炸袭击者

translation.en: [Davis] I get a phone call from Rick DesLauriers,
translation.zh: ‎我接到瑞克·德斯勒尔的电话

translation.en: and I get over there as quickly as possible.
translation.zh: ‎我尽快赶了过去

translation.en: Carmen Ortiz was there, and they cued up the video.
translation.zh:
‎卡门·奥蒂兹在那里
‎他们播放了视频

translation.en: And I got my eyes on these guys for the first time.
translation.zh: ‎我第一次看到了这些人

translation.en: They kept playing it over and over again.
translation.zh: ‎他们一直重复播放

translation.en: When I saw that video, I said, "We have them."
translation.zh:
‎我看到那个视频的时候
‎我说：“找到他们了”

translation.en: "These are the guys."
translation.zh: ‎“就是这些人”

translation.en: [Davis] It was striking to me how innocent they looked.
translation.zh: ‎让我震惊的是 他们看起来那么无辜

translation.en: Backpack over his shoulder, he was walking down the street,
translation.zh: ‎背着背包走在街上

translation.en: looking like any other college kid.
translation.zh: ‎跟其他大学生一样

translation.en: [Ortiz] But we didn't know
translation.zh: ‎但我们不知道

translation.en: who they were,
translation.zh: ‎他们是谁

translation.en: where they were,
translation.zh: ‎他们在哪里

translation.en: and if they were with anyone else.
translation.zh: ‎以及他们是否还有其他同伙

translation.en: [DesLauriers] At that point we had to make a decision
translation.zh: ‎那时候我们被迫做了一个决定

translation.en: as to what do we do with this video evidence.
translation.zh: ‎该怎么处理这个视频证据

translation.en: Do we release it to the American public or do we hold it and continue
translation.zh:
‎我们要把它公开给美国公众
‎还是保留它 继续

translation.en: to work behind the scenes to try to identify these individuals?
translation.zh: ‎在现场背后工作 努力识别这些人？

translation.en: Well, I thought it was absolutely critical
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们必须

translation.en: that we release the pictures to the public.
translation.zh: ‎把照片公开给群众

translation.en: But that was not the feeling at the table.
translation.zh: ‎但其他人不这样想

translation.en: There were differing views
translation.zh: ‎关于何时公开

translation.en: on when to publicize those photos and seek the public's help.
translation.zh:
‎这些照片 寻求公众的帮助
‎大家有不同的看法

translation.en: My impulse is not to keep the information secret.
translation.zh: ‎我的冲动不是要保密

translation.en: It's to publish it. And I was convinced that if we did that,
translation.zh: ‎要公布它 我深信如果我们这样做

translation.en: these guys would be in our pocket within a couple of hours.
translation.zh: ‎这些人就会在几小时内被我们抓获

translation.en: I was met with complete silence.
translation.zh: ‎其他人完全沉默了

translation.en: In the FBI, we want to try to control situations.
translation.zh: ‎在联邦调查局 我们想控制局势

translation.en: If we can control it, it's safer.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们能控制 就更安全

translation.en: If you release the photos of the bombers, you let them know
translation.zh:
‎如果你公开炸弹袭击者的照片
‎你就让他们知道

translation.en: that you know who they are, and you might cause them to flee.
translation.zh:
‎你知道他们是谁了
‎可能会让他们逃跑

translation.en: It is possible that if somebody saw
translation.zh: ‎很可能如果有人看到

translation.en: that the pictures were being published, that they would run.
translation.zh: ‎这些照片被公布了 他们就跑了

translation.en: But who cares?
translation.zh: ‎但谁在乎呢？

translation.en: People know who committed these crimes and will help us.
translation.zh:
‎会有人认识犯下这些罪行的人
‎他们会帮助我们

translation.en: We've got a picture of two people.
translation.zh: ‎我们拿到了两个人的照片

translation.en: Is it just them, or is it bigger than them?
translation.zh: ‎只有他们吗？还是有更多？

translation.en: We didn't think necessarily there were any other bombers.
translation.zh: ‎我们觉得可能没有其他爆炸袭击者

translation.en: But we had to find
translation.zh: ‎但我们必须找到

translation.en: whether there were any collaborators who had supported the bombers.
translation.zh: ‎是否有配合的人支持这些炸弹袭击者

translation.en: We don't know what it is, so we go live with photos.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道那是什么
‎所以我们把照片直播出去

translation.en: We're controlling nothing.
translation.zh: ‎我们就什么都没控制

translation.en: The risk and the potential harm could be huge.
translation.zh: ‎风险和潜在的伤害可能很大

translation.en: Any investigative decision we make,
translation.zh: ‎我们做的任何调查决定

translation.en: particularly in terms of releasing evidence to the American public,
translation.zh: ‎尤其是向美国公众公开证据

translation.en: had to be approved by Carmen
translation.zh: ‎必须得到卡门

translation.en: and the Department of Justice down in Washington, DC.
translation.zh: ‎还有华盛顿的司法部的批准

translation.en: Carmen said, "I've talked to people at Justice,
translation.zh: ‎卡门说：“我跟司法部的人谈了

translation.en: and we are not releasing these photographs."
translation.zh: ‎我们不能公开这些照片”

translation.en: And I was pretty upset about it.
translation.zh: ‎我对此很气愤

translation.en: [Ortiz] I thought we should hold off.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们应该推迟

translation.en: If we had any kind of hot leads that could lead to these individuals,
translation.zh:
‎如果我们有任何线索
‎能找到这些人的话

translation.en: that it would be better to do it that way to try to catch them unawares.
translation.zh:
‎在他们没有意识到的时候抓住他们
‎是更好的方式

translation.en: And I said, "Because I want you to know that if somebody gets hurt,
translation.zh:
‎我说：“因为我希望你知道
‎如果再有人受伤

translation.en: I'm going to go public with that information."
translation.zh: ‎我就公开这些信息”

translation.en: There was a hush.
translation.zh: ‎他们都安静了

translation.en: The meeting ended, and I walked out by myself.
translation.zh: ‎会议结束了 我自己走了出去

translation.en: [Kevin] Karen was in and out of consciousness,
translation.zh: ‎凯伦时而昏迷 时而清醒

translation.en: but she asked what happened to Krystle.
translation.zh: ‎但她问过克里斯特尔怎么样了

translation.en: The first time I could say, "Did she die? I know she did. You have to tell me."
translation.zh:
‎我第一次说：“她死了吗？
‎我知道她死了 你必须告诉我”

translation.en: Um, that's when they told me she had passed.
translation.zh: ‎那时他们告诉我 她已经过世了

translation.en: [reporter] Today, another of the dead was identified.
translation.zh: ‎今天 另一个死者被确认了

translation.en: 29-year-old Krystle Campbell of Medford, Massachusetts.
translation.zh:
‎29岁的马萨诸塞州梅德福的
‎克里斯特尔·坎贝尔

translation.en: We found out the mix-up was with Krystle's phone
translation.zh:
‎我们发现他们搞错了
‎克里斯特尔的手机

translation.en: being put in Karen's pocket.
translation.zh: ‎放在了凯伦的口袋里

translation.en: That cell phone that I had in my pocket, that was Krystle's.
translation.zh: ‎我口袋里的手机是克里斯特尔的

translation.en: Her family was calling it.
translation.zh: ‎她家人给她的手机打电话

translation.en: They were asking for Krystle and they said, "Krystle's right here,"
translation.zh:
‎他们说要找克里斯特尔
‎他们说：“克里斯特尔就在这里”

translation.en: but that was actually Karen in the operating room, not Krystle.
translation.zh:
‎但实际上是凯伦在手术室
‎不是克里斯特尔

translation.en: The boyfriend that Krystle had been dating at the time was the one
translation.zh: ‎克里斯特尔那个时候交往的男朋友

translation.en: that went into the operating room and identified that it was me.
translation.zh: ‎就是走进手术室 确认那是我的人

translation.en: Krystle's family, you know, I mean, I can't imagine how they felt.
translation.zh:
‎克里斯特尔的家人
‎我无法想象他们的感受

translation.en: You know, sitting there all night. Krystle's all right, and then to just all
translation.zh:
‎整晚坐在这里 克里斯特尔没事
‎然后一切

translation.en: turn the other way, is just unbelievable.
translation.zh: ‎完全反过来了 简直难以置信

translation.en: We are heartbroken at the death of our daughter Krystle.
translation.zh: ‎女儿克里斯特尔的死让我们心碎

translation.en: She was a wonderful person.
translation.zh: ‎她是个很棒的人

translation.en: And everybody that knew her loved her.
translation.zh: ‎所有认识她的人都爱她

translation.en: It just really was a lot to take in. It was a lot. It still is to this day.
translation.zh:
‎真的很不容易接受 太难受了
‎直到今天都没办法接受

translation.en: I still don't understand it.
translation.zh: ‎我还是不明白

translation.en: It breaks my heart to think of the poor victims who lost their lives.
translation.zh: ‎想到那些失去生命的受害者令我心碎

translation.en: I took a real person, and I wanted to find out who's responsible for this.
translation.zh:
‎我很重视这些生命
‎我想找出这个罪犯

translation.en: But on Thursday morning,
translation.zh: ‎但在星期四早上

translation.en: President Obama and his wife were coming to town.
translation.zh:
‎奥巴马总统和他的妻子
‎来到了这个城市

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎“我想低头专注 试着变得更好”

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎他说“我们会抓到这些杂种的”

translation.zh: ‎动摇我们美国人的价值观

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎更用力地奔跑 更大声地欢呼

translation.zh: ‎这不是一个你可以恐吓人的地方

translation.zh: ‎这是一种慰藉

translation.zh: ‎但我认为这个城市需要这个

translation.zh: ‎一家波士顿媒体电台要公开这些照片

translation.zh: ‎给美国公众 那时候让我很生气

translation.zh: ‎我是说 我…

translation.zh: ‎事情太大了 无法控制

translation.zh: ‎我们只需要随着情况的变化

translation.zh: ‎四天过去了

translation.zh: ‎什么都没发生

translation.zh: ‎我们此时此刻没有切实可行的办法

translation.zh:

translation.en: to release the video evidence to the American public before the media.
translation.zh:
‎在媒体之前

translation.zh: ‎坦白说 我很宽慰将要发生的事情

translation.zh:
‎我在这样的调查中

translation.zh: ‎我不知道这些东西是如何泄漏的

translation.zh:
‎那天晚些时候

translation.zh:
‎我的线人告诉我

translation.zh:
‎如果你看我身后 会看到

translation.zh:
‎我要让开一下

translation.zh: ‎新闻发布会上人特别多

translation.zh:
‎这是我整个职业生涯
‎人数最多的新闻发布会

translation.zh: ‎在我走上新闻发布会台之前

translation.en: I had never felt more pressure in my life before.
translation.zh: ‎我这辈子从来没有过这么大的压力

translation.en: Felt like the weight of the world was on my shoulders.
translation.zh: ‎感觉整个世界的重担都在我的肩上

translation.en: When I was a kid, and even when I was in law school,
translation.zh:
‎当我还是孩子的时候

translation.en: I was petrified of public speaking.
translation.zh: ‎我很害怕公共演讲

translation.zh: ‎我宁愿玩五个子弹的俄罗斯轮盘赌

translation.zh: ‎也不愿意站在台上讲话

translation.zh: ‎但我知道我有责任发表讲话

translation.en: It was nobody else's speech to give but mine,
translation.zh: ‎除了我没有人能进行这次讲话

translation.en: and I had to come through for the victims.
translation.zh: ‎我必须兑现给这些受害者的承诺

translation.zh: ‎下午好 我是瑞克·德斯勒尔

translation.en: and I am the Special Agent in Charge of the FBI's Boston division.
translation.zh: ‎我是联邦调查局波士顿分部的特工

translation.en: A lot of work went into preparing that speech.
translation.zh: ‎讲话的准备工作很多

translation.en: It was reviewed by the Department of Justice
translation.zh: ‎演讲内容经过司法部审核

translation.en: to make sure didn't say anything that might compromise
translation.zh: ‎以确保我们没有说任何

translation.en: a criminal prosecution of the case.
translation.zh: ‎妥协这个刑事诉讼案件的话

translation.en: After a very detailed analysis of photo, video and other evidence,
translation.zh:
‎在仔细分析了照片
‎视频和其他证据后

translation.zh: ‎我们要公开这两名嫌犯的照片

translation.zh:
‎他们被命名为嫌疑人一号

translation.en: They appear to be associated.
translation.zh: ‎他们似乎有所关联

translation.zh:
‎如果你们看到了这些人
‎请联系执法部门

translation.en: If you know anything about the bombings or the men pictured here,
translation.zh:
‎如果你们知道任何有关这次爆炸

translation.en: please call the telephone listed on the photo arrays.
translation.zh: ‎请拨打这张照片上列出的电话

translation.en: With the media's help, in an instant, these images will be delivered
translation.zh:
‎有了媒体的帮助
‎这些照片将很快被直接传递到

translation.en: directly into the hands of millions around the world.
translation.zh: ‎全世界数百万人的手中

translation.en: We consider them to be armed and extremely dangerous.
translation.zh: ‎我们认为他们是武装的 十分危险

translation.en: No one should approach them.
translation.zh: ‎谁都不要接近他们

translation.en: No one should attempt to apprehend them except law enforcement.
translation.zh: ‎除了执法部门 谁都不要逮捕他们

translation.zh: ‎非常感谢

translation.en: [Martin] Black Hat, White Hat.
translation.zh: ‎黑帽白帽

translation.zh:
‎这些是我们正在寻找的人
‎他们是确定的

translation.zh: ‎人们立刻拿起手机拍照片

translation.en: getting this information to the public ASAP.
translation.zh: ‎尽快把这些信息发给公众

translation.zh:
‎联邦调查局公开了
‎波士顿马拉松爆炸案中

translation.en: in the Boston Marathon bombing case.
translation.zh: ‎两名犯罪嫌疑人的照片

translation.en: And again, a moment that people around the world had been waiting for.
translation.zh: ‎世界人民期待的时刻

translation.en: Now we're seeing the pictures. They're asking for the public's help.
translation.zh:
‎现在我们看到照片了
‎他们在向公众求助

translation.en: [Martin] This was clearly meant to flush out the suspects.
translation.zh: ‎这显然是为了找出嫌疑人

translation.en: And it was also clear that law enforcement was under a lot of pressure.
translation.zh: ‎而且很明显执法部门面临压力

translation.en: We were confident that members of the public would identify these bombers
translation.zh: ‎我们相信公众会认出这些爆炸犯

translation.en: and let us know who they were.
translation.zh: ‎让我们知道他们是谁

translation.en: They are the most wanted men in America tonight. Have a look.
translation.zh:
‎今夜在美国
‎他们是最想被找到的人 看一看

translation.en: The FBI today unveiled Suspect Number One and Suspect Number Two.
translation.zh:
‎联邦调查局今天公布了
‎嫌疑人一号和嫌疑人二号

translation.en: …two suspects, and called on the public to help identify the men
translation.zh:
‎…两个嫌疑犯并且呼吁公众
‎来帮助认出他们

translation.zh: ‎两人被描述为有武装、很危险

translation.zh: ‎调查人员正试着把名字加到照片上

translation.zh:
‎我一个朋友给我打电话

translation.zh: ‎他给我发了这张白帽黑帽的照片

translation.zh: ‎他说“呦 这看着不像焦哈尔吗？”

translation.zh: ‎我说

translation.zh: ‎“首先 你知道你指认他

translation.zh: ‎有怎样的意义吗？“

translation.zh: ‎“你知道你现在在说什么吗？”

translation.en: "This is not Dzhokhar."
translation.zh: ‎“这不是焦哈尔”

translation.zh: ‎我们一起做过救生员

translation.zh: ‎他是摔跤队的队长

translation.zh: ‎这个冷静、受欢迎的孩子

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎这个我关心和信任的朋友

translation.zh: ‎做了这样的事情 我必须背负着

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我是说 我…

translation.zh:
‎最终发生的确实是

translation.zh:
